title: New: Goodbye Chanel – Foreva
content:
Goodbye Chanel couldn’t sound less British if they tried.

Having started life as the solo project of Scott Johnson, GC has blossomed into a five piece, which has hugely benefitted their live shows in particular. With 2013’s EP Through Night To Paradise gaining them fans up and down the country, they’re set to follow it up with a second EP, Hot City Nights, out in April on Dead Young. The first single to be lifted from said EP comes in the form of Foreva, another slice of languid, dreamy pop, drifting in somewhere between Wild Nothing and Craft Spells. Stream it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
